UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Synthetic Peptide Derived from Scorpion Venom Displays Minimal Toxicity and Anti-infective Activity in an Animal Model.
Literature.Author: Oliveira CS, Torres MDT, Pedron CN, Andrade VB, Silva Jr PI, Silva FD, de la Fuente-Núnez C, Oliveira Jr VX

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli AIG 221(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli AIG 222(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=64µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=16µM),Klebsiella oxytoca CIP 79.32(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=2µM),Enterobacter cloacae beta-12(MIC=16µM)
